snippet.title: Tower Princess: I've come for you! - Trailer
snippet.description:
Add Tower Princess to your wishlist on Steam! - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1138650/Tower_Princess/

Hi to Everyone! this is the second Tower Princess demo Trailer!

TowerPrincess is a Time attack 3D platformer with acction roguelike! This means that the dungeon, the rewards, the challenges, Knights/knightesses, princes/princesses, Enemies, Bosses... all of them will be procedural, making every gameplay unique!

You will incarnate a hundrum knight, who entered in the Dragon's Castle to rescue his ideal princess and kill the Evil Dragon who kidnapped her, looking for power, treasures, knowledge, or simply true love. But every princess can be worse than the previous one. The knight came to rescue a princess after all, so he will have to date her, while battles hords and hords of enemies!.
.
-You can download and test the Alpha on :

--https://awekteam.itch.io/towerprincess

--https://gamejolt.com/games/TowerPrinc...

-web

--http://www.towerprincess.com/

-Discord Community

--https://discord.gg/aMegu2j

MUSIC BY: Landon Walter!
Souncloud: https://soundcloud.com/landon-walter/sets
Twitter: @LandonMWMusic

AND AMAZING KOBOLD DUB!
Twitter: @Connor Ludovice
.
We hope you like it! Thank you very much! ❤
